agent_2.lastThought: My inventory is full with 5 items. To gather more resources like the stone nearby, I need to free up space. Since my hunger is high (98/100), eating a berry would be wasteful. I will place a wood block on the ground to start a resource stash and make room in my inventory.

agent_3.name: Zara
agent_3.lastThought: I see Aria and Nova nearby, and there's a berry bush right below me. I'll gather some food first to stay healthy, then I'll introduce myself.

agent_4.name: Nova
agent_4.lastThought: My inventory is currently full, which prevents me from gathering any more resources. To stay efficient, I need to free up space. I will place one of my stone blocks to the right to start a structure and then head south toward the wood and stone I've spotted.

messages.content: Hi Aria and Nova! I'm Zara. That sounds like a wonderful idea! I'd love to help build a shelter. I'll start gathering some resources nearby!
Hi Aria and Nova! I'm Zara. It's nice to meet you both! I'd love to help build a shelter. I'll start looking for resources nearby!
Hi Aria and Nova! I'm Zara. It's great to meet you! I'd love to help gather resources and build a shelter together.
Hi Zara! I'm Aria. It's so nice to meet you! I'd love to build a shelter together. I'm going to gather some wood nearby to get us started!
Hi Aria! That sounds like a wonderful idea. I'll help you gather those wood blocks!
Hi Aria! I'm Zara. That sounds like a wonderful idea! I'll gather some berries from these bushes so we have food while we work.
Hi Aria! I'm Zara. It's nice to meet you too! A shelter sounds like a wonderful idea, I'd love to help you gather what we need.
Hi Aria! I'm Zara. That sounds like a wonderful plan! I'll start by gathering some berries for us from this bush.

agent_1.name: Aria
agent_1.lastThought: I'll move closer to the stone at (5, 1) so I can gather it for our shelter. I also want to greet Nova and see if they want to help us.

agent_2.name: Rex
agent_2.lastThought: I see wood directly below me. My hunger is high, so I don't need to eat yet. I have space for one more item in my inventory, so I will gather the wood to prepare for future needs.

agent_3.name: Zara
agent_3.lastThought: Aria mentioned we are building a shelter together! I'll gather some berries from the bush nearby to make sure we have enough food for the project while she looks for stone.

agent_4.name: Nova
agent_4.lastThought: I have one inventory slot remaining and there is a stone block immediately to my right. Aria mentioned they are building a shelter, so gathering more resources is the most efficient move right now. I'll fill my inventory before deciding where to contribute.

agent_1.name: Aria
agent_1.lastThought: I'm happy to have friends like Zara and Nova nearby. I'll move toward them so we can coordinate our building efforts and find a good spot for our shelter.

agent_2.name: Rex
agent_2.lastThought: My inventory is currently full, which prevents me from gathering more wood or stone. Even though I am not very hungry, eating one of my berries will free up a space in my inventory so I can continue to collect resources for survival.

agent_3.name: Zara
agent_3.lastThought: Aria mentioned we're working on a shelter together. I see some stone nearby that she might need for the foundation, so I'll move toward it and Aria to help out.

agent_4.name: Nova
agent_4.lastThought: My inventory is currently at maximum capacity, which is inefficient as it prevents me from gathering more resources. I see a berry bush directly above me at (9, 1). I will place a stone block to my right to clear a slot in my inventory, then I can gather berries to manage my hunger and continue optimizing my resource collection.
